Physicists aren't the only people doing #physics. Bright minds are using it in every field. For 125 years, we've supported and united scientists to move physics forward in every corner of #science. #APS125

Self-aligning active agents with inertia and active torque. Authors: Jeremy Fersula, Nicolas Bredeche, and Olivier Dauchot. Extending the study of the inertial effects on the two-dimensional dynamics of active agents to the case where self-alignment is present. Discover more in Physical Review E: https://go.aps.org/4f5K8Xn.

As Earthâ€™s climate warms, the Gulf Stream and other Atlantic Ocean currents will slow down. Sometimes an industry-changing idea can come to you when you least expect it. #OTD more than 400 years ago, astronomer Johannes Kepler was lecturing on the periodic conjunction of Jupiter when he had an epiphany that helped link the fields of #physics and #astronomy. Discover what it was in #APSNews: https://go.aps.org/3fDpNtD.
